# elements

**Instance Property**

The input elements of a virtual controller.

## Declaration

```swift
var elements: Set<String> { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values you can include in this array are the names of the following constants: [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputButtonA-8z15w], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputButtonB-6z361], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputButtonX-32i2z], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputButtonY-9x9i9], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputDirectionPad-115st], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputLeftThumbstick-3hlff], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputRightThumbstick-8469p], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputLeftShoulder-9assr], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputRightShoulder-5lcq1], [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputLeftTrigger-80png], and [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputRightTrigger-96vtj].



For example, configure a virtual controller with a left thumb stick, right thumb stick, A button, and B button.

```swift
virtualConfiguration.elements = [GCInputLeftThumbstick,GCInputRightThumbstick,GCInputButtonA,GCInputButtonB]
```
title: elements
